item.title: Interests
item.description: Coding ğŸ’» (Under Construction) How I Started (TODO) I’ve been programming for a while now. I started programming in my early high school years. My first programming love sparks were born when I started writing World of Warcraft macros at the age of 15. After a couple of years, I found out to be simple Lua scripts. I was quite fascinated by this fact because that’s when I realized that those macros were my first steps in the programming world.
